resource.name: Botswana AMR Antibiotic Susceptibility LOINC
resource.description: Collection of LOINC codes for antibiotic-susceptibility tests (MIC panel and individual drugs)

resource.name: Botswana AMR DiagnosticReport
resource.description: Bundles AMR susceptibility observations into one report

resource.name: Botswana AMR Specimen Type VS
resource.description: Specimen types used in Botswana AMR data collection, reusing v3-SpecimenType codes

resource.name: Botswana AMR Susceptibility Observation
resource.description: Records S/I/R (and optional MIC) for a single antibiotic test on a specimen
This profile describes a diagnostic report in microbiology

resource.description: This profile describes a colony count test in miobiology.

resource.description: This profile describes whether a microorganism is detected by culture method.

resource.description: This profile describes the type of multi-resistant organism
